articles.author: DeFi Pulse 🍇
articles.description:
📰 @CoinbaseInsto submitted a Maker Improvement Proposal (MIP) for @MakerDAO to deposit ~1.6B USDC from the PSM into a yield-bearing account to earn 1.5% APY as a part of Coinbase's Institutional Rewards Program.
For more⬇️
MakerDAO Growth: .@CoinbaseInsto submitted a Maker Improvement Proposal (MIP) to transfer ~1.6B USDC from the PSM into a yield-bearing account in Coinbase Prime that will provide up to 1.5% APY on @MakerDAO's USDC holdings.
➡️
 https://forum.makerdao.com/t/mipxx-coinbase-usdc-institutional-rewards/17703

articles.author: DeFi Pulse 🍇
articles.description:
What is @RuneKek's vision for @MakerDAO?
The Endgame Plan is a roadmap for how Maker aims to create an Unbiased World Currency by making $DAI "bitcoin-like":
▶️ Decentralized
▶️ Intrinsically resilient
▶️ No changes to core system scope & complexity
For more insight 👇
Ignas | DeFi Research: 1/ Maker's mission is to create an Unbiased World Currency.
How?
MakerDAO has an Endgame Plan for it 🧵

articles.author: DeFi Pulse 🍇
articles.description:
🏎A fast track for becoming an Ethereum core developer and researcher is now available through the @ethereum Protocol Fellowship (EPF). 
EPF is now accepting applications for its 3rd cohort through September 16th.✨
For more details👇
Mario Havel: Welcome to the Ethereum Protocol Fellowship.
The fast track to becoming an Ethereum core dev is now open! 
A fellowship program for anyone who is interested in diving deeply into core protocol research and development. EPF is now accepting applications:
 https://blog.ethereum.org/2022/09/01/ethereum-protocol-fellowship-third

articles.author: DeFi Pulse 🍇
articles.description:
📢Folks, please upgrade your nodes.
Ethereum: The Merge is coming: UPGRADE YOUR CLIENTS!
• The Bellatrix upgrade is scheduled for epoch 144896 on the Beacon Chain – 11:34:47am UTC on Sept 6, 2022
• The TTD value triggering The Merge is 58750000000000000000000, expected between 10-20 Sep 2022
MORE:
 https://blog.ethereum.org/2022/08/24/mainnet-merge-announcement/
articles.title: 📢Folks, please upgrade your nodes.
